# eyc Provider

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required
- `token` (String) The token key for API operations, can be retrieved from `https://cloud.engineyard.com/cli`

### Optional

- `api_endpoint` (String) The URL to use for the EYC API.
